message: The very idea of sex trafficking in Boise may be an enigma for some, but recent headlines have made it a front-page issue across the Treasure Valley. No fewer than 10 Southwest Idaho men were busted this month, accused of trying to arrange sex with minors.

data.description: "Where are these girls who have been victimized? They're in our neighborhoods. They're attending schools with our kids."
data.title: Trafficked: Idaho Anti-Trafficking Coalition Tackles Escalating Sex Trade
